definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of the nurse post responsibility model.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討實施“護士崗位責任制”的方法與效果。

sentences.english: Some 60% said that saving jobs was more important than paying dividends.
sentences.chinese: 大約60%的人說，保留工作崗位比派發紅利更重要。

sentences.english: As a professional, your position will not be entitled for overtime payment.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個專業人士，你的崗位不會獲得任何加班補貼。

sentences.english: Bank scaling up efforts to support the creation of good jobs.
sentences.chinese: 世行正加大工作力度，支持創造好的就業崗位。

sentences.english: It turns out that the anti-job-loss policies make workers expensive to employ.
sentences.chinese: 結局是，防止崗位流失政策使僱傭工人變得昂貴。

sentences.english: All comrades in the Party, no matter what posts they are in.
sentences.chinese: 全黨同志無論在什麼崗位上。

sentences.english: The company turned to the head-hunting company for some special positions.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司通過獵頭公司尋找符合特殊崗位的人才。

sentences.english: Two thirds of these posts are open to fresh college grads.
sentences.chinese: 這些崗位中，三分之二是向大學應屆畢業生開放的。

sentences.english: In Virginia, 19, 000 jobs are at risk.
sentences.chinese: 在維吉尼亞，有19000個工作崗位在風雨中飄搖。

sentences.english: Employment in industry has shrunk by 90% in the past decade, “almost as if by witchcraft”, says one sheepish boss.
sentences.chinese: 工業生產工作崗位在過去十年裏縮水了90%。

sentences.english: more than a quarter had been off work for at least a week, the research showed.
sentences.chinese: 多於四分之一的人離開過工作崗位少則一星期。

sentences.english: And those slots are coveted positions.
sentences.chinese: 並且那些待聘的崗位都是令人垂涎的職位。

sentences.english: A. I’ll probably go back to when I got this job.
sentences.chinese: 我大概會回到自己剛走上這個崗位的時候。

sentences.english: All employees who move into supervisory positions must figure it out on their own.
sentences.chinese: 所有打算競爭管理崗位的員工必須完全依靠自己完成。

sentences.english: You are welcome! Is there any position which could develop my best ability?
sentences.chinese: 不客氣，您那邊有可以讓我發揮所長的崗位嗎？

sentences.english: 3 employee injury, according to my post salary 100%.
sentences.chinese: 3員工工傷期間，按本人崗位工資100%計發。

definition: to be employed/to be in post/on-the-job
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
every trade/all professions/all walks of life
